Html:
I installed the latest installer and now typescript doesn't update the javascripts anymore.

Any idea what causes it?
even if i delete the javascript and compile the app, nothing happens.

It does however compile the javascript if I add a new typescript file, the one that contains a point class example. that gets a correct js file with it at first when I add it.
Any change to it is as dead as my other ts files..
Make sure that under tools-->options, typescript is set to compile on save and/or build.

There is a slight misconception with the WebEssentials 2012 plugin I feel.

From what I had read it was needed, where as all it is needed for is the split screen, which I don't want anyway.

I find (with v0.9+ anyway) it compiles far faster after disabling the WE2012 plugin and enabling the core typescript plugin compile settings.

Worth a note :)
